General.Name: Xian Xice Testing Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: XI'AN XICE TESTING TECHNOLOGY CO., LTD provides testing services in China. The company offers environment and reliability test, such as climate environment test, mechanical environment test, comprehensive stress test, and reliability test, etc.; electromagnetic compatibility test; and testing and screening of electronic components and related technical consulting services. Its services cover aerospace, aviation, weapons, ships, electronics, and civil aircraft industries and fields. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Xi'an, China.
